property.name: type
property.description: The type or category of an entity (e.g., 'allow', 'deny', 'page').

property.name: threshold
property.description: The value for a sales order threshold.

property.name: fee
property.description: A fee associated with a sales order threshold.

property.name: deltaWithSubtotal
property.description: The difference between a threshold and the order subtotal.

property.name: message
property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: salesOrderThresholdValues
property.description: A collection of sales order threshold values.

property.name: salesOrderThresholdType
property.description: The type of a sales order threshold.

property.name: key
property.description: A unique key used to identify an entity or a piece of data.
